org.apache.flink.util

类 InstantiationUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.util.InstantiationUtil

  • @Internal
public final class InstantiationUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to create instances from class objects and checking failure reasons.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  InstantiationUtil.ClassLoaderObjectInputStream
      A custom ObjectInputStream that can load classes using a specific ClassLoader.
      static class  InstantiationUtil.FailureTolerantObjectInputStream
      An ObjectInputStream that ignores serialVersionUID mismatches when deserializing objects of anonymous classes or our Scala serializer classes and also replaces occurences of GenericData.Array (from Avro) by a dummy class so that the KryoSerializer can still be deserialized without Avro being on the classpath.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private static org.slf4j.Logger LOG 
      private static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> scalaSerializerClassnames
      This is maintained as a temporary workaround for FLINK-6869.
      private static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> scalaTypes
      The serialVersionUID might change between Scala versions and since those classes are part of the tuple serializer config snapshots we need to ignore them.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      限定符 构造器和说明
      private InstantiationUtil()
      Private constructor to prevent instantiation.

    • 字段详细资料

      • LOG

        private static final org.slf4j.Logger LOG

      • scalaSerializerClassnames

        private static final java.util.Set<java.lang.String> scalaSerializerClassnames
        This is maintained as a temporary workaround for FLINK-6869.

        Before 1.3, the Scala serializers did not specify the serialVersionUID. Although since 1.3 they are properly specified, we still have to ignore them for now as their previous serialVersionUIDs will vary depending on the Scala version.

        This can be removed once 1.2 is no longer supported.

      • scalaTypes

        private static final java.util.Set<java.lang.String> scalaTypes
        The serialVersionUID might change between Scala versions and since those classes are part of the tuple serializer config snapshots we need to ignore them.
        另请参阅:
        FLINK-8451

    • 构造器详细资料

      • InstantiationUtil

        private InstantiationUtil()
        Private constructor to prevent instantiation.

    • 方法详细资料

      • instantiate

        public static <T> T instantiate(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                java.lang.Class<? super T> castTo)
        Creates a new instance of the given class.
        类型参数:
        T - The generic type of the class.
        参数:
        clazz - The class to instantiate.
        castTo - Optional parameter, specifying the class that the given class must be a subclass off. This argument is added to prevent class cast exceptions occurring later.
        返回:
        An instance of the given class.
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - Thrown, if the class could not be instantiated. The exception contains a detailed message about the reason why the instantiation failed.

      • instantiate

        public static <T> T instantiate(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Creates a new instance of the given class.
        类型参数:
        T - The generic type of the class.
        参数:
        clazz - The class to instantiate.
        返回:
        An instance of the given class.
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - Thrown, if the class could not be instantiated. The exception contains a detailed message about the reason why the instantiation failed.

      • hasPublicNullaryConstructor

        public static boolean hasPublicNullaryConstructor(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Checks, whether the given class has a public nullary constructor.
        参数:
        clazz - The class to check.
        返回:
        True, if the class has a public nullary constructor, false if not.

      • isPublic

        public static boolean isPublic(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Checks, whether the given class is public.
        参数:
        clazz - The class to check.
        返回:
        True, if the class is public, false if not.

      • isProperClass

        public static boolean isProperClass(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Checks, whether the class is a proper class, i.e. not abstract or an interface, and not a primitive type.
        参数:
        clazz - The class to check.
        返回:
        True, if the class is a proper class, false otherwise.

      • isNonStaticInnerClass

        public static boolean isNonStaticInnerClass(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Checks, whether the class is an inner class that is not statically accessible. That is especially true for anonymous inner classes.
        参数:
        clazz - The class to check.
        返回:
        True, if the class is a non-statically accessible inner class.

      • checkForInstantiation

        public static void checkForInstantiation(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
        Performs a standard check whether the class can be instantiated by Class#newInstance().
        参数:
        clazz - The class to check.
        抛出:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - Thrown, if the class cannot be instantiated by Class#newInstance().

      • checkForInstantiationError

      • clone

        public static <T extends java.io.Serializable> T clone(T obj)
                                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                                       java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Clones the given serializable object using Java serialization.
        类型参数:
        T - Type of the object to clone
        参数:
        obj - Object to clone
        返回:
        Cloned object
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • clone

        public static <T extends java.io.Serializable> T clone(T obj,
                                                       java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
                                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                                       java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Clones the given serializable object using Java serialization, using the given classloader to resolve the cloned classes.
        类型参数:
        T - Type of the object to clone
        参数:
        obj - Object to clone
        classLoader - The classloader to resolve the classes during deserialization.
        返回:
        Cloned object
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

      • createCopyWritable

        public static <T extends IOReadableWritable> T createCopyWritable(T original)
                                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Clones the given writable using the serialization.
        类型参数:
        T - Type of the object to clone
        参数:
        original - Object to clone
        返回:
        Cloned object
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown is the serialization fails.
